snippet.title: CLÉRIGA RELEASE TRAILER
snippet.description:
https://nugra.itch.io/clriga

HERE, NOTHING EVER DIES

SONG: Red sex by vessel

After 82 years after Xyvran was sealed Clériga must return to the place she lost it all so she can fix the seal that has been damaged by the passage of time.

As she explores the abandoned palace where the demon somewhere resides, her blood starts to be absorbed. Fix the seal before you lose yourself.
